The #1 preschool building toy in the U.S.A.

Ideal for ages 1+, and endorsed by Fisher-Price, these blocks help to develop imagination and fine motor skills
body.description: Product Description Spark their imagination with the #1 preschool construction toy in the U.S.A. This award-winning set of 80 big and vibrant building blocks is the perfect toy for your toddler's little hands and big imagination. You'll love that these big blocks fit and come apart with ease, helping to develop their fine motor and thinking skills as they stack. Best of all, these blocks can be combined with any Mega Bloks toy to extend playtime for hours on end. From the Manufacturer Play, store and take it with you wherever you go! The 80 piece Maxi Blocks Classic Bag by Mega Bloks includes 80 big building blocks! It is the perfect toy for your little building fan who is just learning how to build with his own two hands. Give him the opportunity to stimulate his imagination and learning skills while encouraging discovery, fine motor skills and open-ended play. The practical storage bag keeps all of the pieces securely in one place and comes with a hand-strap to make carrying the blocks a snap!Ideal for children 1 year old and up!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Spark your little builder's imagination with 80 big building blocks!
The perfect fit for little hands to bring their imagination to life with open-ended and creative play! Toddlers can build a heart, a bird and more! Includes a variety of colorful blocks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Building Big Dreams, One Block at a Time!
reviews.reviewText: Okay, let's talk about the MEGA BLOKS Fisher-Price Toddler Block Toys. As a parent of a 1-year-old tornado, I can't tell you how much sanity these blocks have saved me. Seriously, they're like a magical distraction that keeps my little one entertained for ages.First things first, the quantity: 80 pieces! That's like a whole universe of building potential right there. And the fact that they come in a convenient storage bag? Genius. No more stepping on rogue blocks in the middle of the night. Thank you, Fisher-Price, for saving my feet!Now, let's talk about durability. These blocks can withstand some serious toddler abuse. I'm talking throwing, biting, and everything in between. They're solid, chunky, and perfect for little hands that are still mastering the art of gentle play.And let's not forget about the colors! Bright, vibrant, and oh-so-enticing. My kiddo's eyes light up every time we dump them out onto the floor. It's like a rainbow explosion of creativity.But here's the best part: watching my little one's imagination run wild as they stack, sort, and knock down towers taller than themselves. It's pure joy, my friends.So, if you're in the market for a toy that's not only fun but also educational and durable enough to withstand the chaos of toddlerhood, look no further than the MEGA BLOKS Fisher-Price Toddler Block Toys. Your little builder will thank you, and you'll thank yourself every time you see that blissful look of concentration on their face. Trust me, it's worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Please parents take your phones away away from your children! Our children need to develop their imaginations and create. These blocks are very high-quality, large enough not to fit in your mouth, very colorful and easy to build. I bought for my niece mainly because her parents keep giving her their stupid cell phone. Come on people take a few minutes and sit on the floor and create with your kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are a must have! They are easily workable for my grandson, who is not quite two. My granddaughter who is a little older likes them.Their parents as well as us find them very easy to work with. Every household should have these for younger children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure who loves these blocks more, my husband or my son. Either way, I love watching them build. It brings back a lot of good memories for my husband and watching them play together makes me happy. This was definitely a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for those little imaginative minds!
reviews.reviewText: These blocks are exactly what our household needed. We are always looking for toys that stem creativity! These are nice strong plastic, hold together well, vibrant colors and come with their own plastic carrying case. Wins across the board. Great for kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Toddler loves it
reviews.reviewText: My son loves these blocks! Yes they go everywhere and yes I find them in the randomest spots, but they’re great for building and I can always count on them being safe for independent play. I will say they need a little bit of “breaking in” since the blocks are a tight fit when stacking at first. Wasnt an issue for long for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The more the merrier!
reviews.reviewText: Bought two for twin boys. The colors are bright and the blocks are durable. Added these to an existing set. More blocks make for more fun and larger structures. Sturdy enough for building and demolishing fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality and value for money!!
The media could not be loaded. De buen material excelente los colores fuertes...le gustaron a mi hijo

The media could not be loaded. Brinquedo excelente!!! Minha filha gostou muito. As cores são fiéis as imagens, são vibrantes e bem coloridas!! Gostei muito, e também vale notar que não é daqueles legos macios de borrracha, são legos duros e especialmente para crianças +2 anos para aprenderem a encaixar as peças. Minha filha ficou dizendo as cores. Recomendo!! Ah, e veio com uma bolsa de plástico para armazenar as peças.
